summary: This documentary tells the story of a group of Australian and South African surfers who revolutionized their sport in Hawaii during the winter of 1975.
cast: Reno Abellira|Clyde Aikau|Eddie Aikau|Ben Aipa|Bernie Baker|Wayne Bartholomew|Larry Bertlemann|Ian Cairns|Nick Carroll|Tom Carroll|Tom Curren|Mick Fanning|Jeff Hakman|Fred Hemmings|Michael Ho|Andy Irons|Dave Kalama|Drew Kampion|Barry Kanaiaupuni|Dane Kealoha|Buffalo Keaulana|Titus Kinimaka|Corey Lopez|Gerry Lopez|Rob Machado|Bob McKnight|Dan Merkel|Al Merrick|Paul Naude|Greg Noll|Edward Norton|Jamie O'Brien|Joel Parkinson|Randy Rarick|Mark Richards|Eddie Rothman|Rory Russell|Kelly Slater|Jordy Smith|Graham Stapleberg|Michael Tomson|Shaun Tomson|Peter Townend|Mark Warren
title: Bustin' Down the Door
